blog.name: letascamander
blog.title: SHE'S GONE WHERE THE GOBLINS GO

tags: god I hate it sooo much
how anyone can think that THAT is romantic is beyond me
Peggy got married and had kids
you'd be erasing Sharon Carter's existence and leaving Bucky in Hydra's hands
leave the poor woman alone and let Steve retire already!
summary: Potentially unpopular opinion but I loathe that Steve will survive Avengers: Endgame and will time travel back to the 40s to be...
body: Potentially unpopular opinion but I loathe that Steve will survive Avengers: Endgame and will time travel back to the 40s to be with Peggy theory with my entire goddamn being. The idea of erasing that much of both Steve and Peggy’s lives and creating that many plot holes just so they can get together makes me feel so uncomfortable. Just leave Peggy’s life alone and let Steve retire from being Captain America.

reblog.comment: Potentially unpopular opinion but I loathe that Steve will survive Avengers: Endgame and will time travel back to the 40s to be with Peggy theory with my entire goddamn being. The idea of erasing that much of both Steve and Peggy’s lives and creating that many plot holes just so they can get together makes me feel so uncomfortable. Just leave Peggy’s life alone and let Steve retire from being Captain America.

trail.content_raw: Potentially unpopular opinion but I loathe that Steve will survive Avengers: Endgame and will time travel back to the 40s to be with Peggy theory with my entire goddamn being. The idea of erasing that much of both Steve and Peggy’s lives and creating that many plot holes just so they can get together makes me feel so uncomfortable. Just leave Peggy’s life alone and let Steve retire from being Captain America.
trail.content: Potentially unpopular opinion but I loathe that Steve will survive Avengers: Endgame and will time travel back to the 40s to be with Peggy theory with my entire goddamn being. The idea of erasing that much of both Steve and Peggy’s lives and creating that many plot holes just so they can get together makes me feel so uncomfortable. Just leave Peggy’s life alone and let Steve retire from being Captain America.

summary: New ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory says the real villain will help defeat Thanos
title: New ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory says the real villain will help defeat Thanos
body:
These theories are getting BETTER AND BETTER!! This one is AWESOME!!

The Avengers are obviously going to defeat Thanos in the upcoming Avengers: Endgame and undo the snap no matter what the cost might be. This is the endgame, after all, the epic conclusion of more than 10 years of Marvel movies, which means they’re bound to win. But Thanos may not be the film’s biggest villain, even if he’s the one to beat. A new theory says that the actual bad guy in Avengers 4 w…

summary:
I randomly HATE that Marvel has decided to use the “Decimation” to refer to Thanos’ snap.
The root of decimate is literally to...
body:
I randomly HATE that Marvel has decided to use the “Decimation” to refer to Thanos’ snap.

The root of decimate is literally to reduce by a tenth, and though most people use it interchangeably with like destroy, obliterate, etc in current usage, I think the sentence “After Thanos decimated half the population…” to be needlessly contradictory when there are other words you could use. I just think this is a situation where a thesaurus should have been consulted.

This post brought to you by the Avengers: Endgame synopsis released today.


Because Thanos is literally (and mathematically) worse than a decimation…

summary:
Avengers: Endgame (And Some Others) - Edit
What if the Avengers came across the DC movie universe in Avengers:...
body:
Avengers: Endgame (And Some Others) - Edit

What if the Avengers came across the DC movie universe in Avengers: Endgame?

Characters: Captain Marvel, Black Widow (Infinity War), Scarlet Witch (Age of Ultron), The Flash (Justice League), Mera (Justice League), Shazam (Edited), Superman (Justicr League), Spider-Man (Homecoming), Batman (Edited), Wonder Woman, Hawkeye (Endgame)

summary: Samuel L. Jackson just leaked a big spoiler for ‘Captain Marvel’ and ‘Avengers: Endgame’
title: Samuel L. Jackson just leaked a big spoiler for ‘Captain Marvel’ and ‘Avengers: Endgame’
body:
Oh snap… wait.. oh UN-SNAP.. Thanos is finished!

Samuel L. Jackson is no Tom Holland or Mark Ruffalo when it comes to Avengers leaks, but he certainly seems ready to spoil some details about the upcoming movies. Exactly a month ago, the actor who will reprise his Nick Fury role in at least two Marvel movies this year (Captain Marvel and Spider-Man: Far From Home) casually dropped a huge detail about Captain Marvel. He confirmed that she can…

summary: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
title: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
body:
Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale

Da quando è uscito Avengers: Infinity War e metà dell’universo è stato decimato da Thanos, inclusi alcuni dei nostri amati supereroi, i fan hanno speculato sui possibili viaggi nel tempo da parte dei restanti supereroi come Iron Man, Capitan America, Black Widow, Hulk, Hawkeye e Thor, tra gli altri.

Infatti, subito dopo l’uscita di Avengers: Infinity War, alcune foto provenienti dal set di Avenge…

blog.description: | DC, Marvel, and Star Wars Lover! | Please ask for permission if you would like to use any edits!

summary:
Avengers: Endgame Leaked Suits Concept!
I love the look of the suits! Tony's armor strikes a resemblance to mark 51 from the...
body:
Avengers: Endgame Leaked Suits Concept!

I love the look of the suits! Tony’s armor strikes a resemblance to mark 51 from the comics. The suit he used in the “Invincible. Iron Man” series. Since mark 50 was used in Infinity War, maybe this is Marvel’s version of mark 51. If it is, we can assume it has the same features with the nanotech.

Hulk’s suit looks similar to the one we saw in the concept art just like the rest of the suits. People started to theorize that Hulk could take on his Professer Hulk role from the comics, and there is a high chance he could. Professor Hulk is basically Hulk and Banner working together to retain both Hulk’s strength and Banner’s smarts at the same time. It’s a very interesting concept isn’t it?

Thor’s suit is similar to the one he donned in Avengers: Infinity War if not the same. Cap has that same Avengers logo we saw in Age of Ultron now that the remaining Avengers have reunited as a proper team. Clint is rocking a badass haircut. The five look good.
